Text: Duke of Leuchtenberg was a title created twice by the monarchs of Bavaria for their relatives.

*Duke of Leuchtenberg
2:
--------------------
<Text: Duke of Leuchtenberg:  It was re-created by Maximilian I Joseph, King of Bavaria on 14 November 1817 and awarded to his son-in-law Eugène de Beauharnais.>
Triplets:<Duke of Leuchtenberg

ere are the extracted triplets:

<Duke of Leuchtenberg
4:
--------------------
Text: Duke of Leuchtenberg:  King Maximilian Joseph compensated his son-in-law after he lost his other titles and named him heir to the kingdom after the male-line descendants of the royal house and next in precedence after the Royal Family.
